page.title: 18DAY IN THE LIFE OF L. FEARN
page.content: At 7.30a.m.,I wake up & read for ten minutes. Then I rise and get dressed. I wash & clean my teeth. After, I go downstairs & lay the table for mum. Then I eat my breakfast. At 8.15 I put my coat on & go out-side. The{taxi} picks me up at 8.25 a.m. We arrive at{ {school}at 8.45 a.m. Assembly is at 9.00 a.m. When Assembly has finished, we do Maths & English. We have morning break from 10.30-10.45 Then it's lessons until 12 noon, when we have dinner. There are two sittings and I go to second at 12.30 p.m. The dinners are cooked on the premises. Afternoon school is from 1.00 p.m. to 3.00 p.m., when we do Poetry, Art, Dancing, Topic Work and Games etc. At 3.0 o'clock, I go home on the taxi. After tea, at 6.0 p.m., I watch {television}until I go to bed at 8 p.m. Louise Ann Fearn Age 11 yrs.
